body: And remember, there is always a new way to draw a penis thrusting into, and coming inside, a little girl's vagina. The devil bless lolicon!
now i just need english ver. :3

@nhcasual The busty girls name is Rumina inukai, and the guy the next to the mc of this story at the start is Sousuke. So they are the Brother and sister from "Otouto de Otoko o Shirimashita".  Yeah it's tied to the other stories.

@nhcasual From the little bit of machine translation I did, this seems to be a standalone story. Gist of the story: MC leaves a love note intended for the busty girl, but it accidentally goes to an eight-year-old child prodigy who's attending the same high school, so we end up with a rather odd pairing.
Yess new dojin from this artist
I love this artist so much!
Is this one also tied to the other stories of Niramikko Koujou(artist)?
